name: Grey Cube - Endless Barrier Runner
description:
This game is all about reflexes, after a short time cubes start to come faster and faster and the only thing you have got is your reflexes!

COMPETE AGAINST THE WORLD!

-Be on the top of the Worldwide leaderboard to show who is the best!

CONTROLLS

There are five lanes which you can switch between and cubes come into your directions. What you have to do is switch lanes by tapping on left or right side of the screen to avoid the oncoming cubes.
